release.name: Of all the gin joints in all the towns in all the world, she walks into mine

intro.p: This is the 0.7.94 release of the GStreamer Python bindings. It should be used with the 0.8.x series of GStreamer and GStreamer Plugins.
This release contains a fairly big amount of improvements of the previous release. It requires PyGTK 2.4.0 and Python 2.3.

features.feature: Memory leaks plugged and bugs fixes
